item.title: Required talking
item.dc:creator: @xxpkpurexx xxpkpurexx
item.description:
@xxpkpurexx wrote:

surfer has it right thats exactly what i wouldve said if i saw this earlier but if it doesnt work do this

if(command.startsWith("talking") && command.length() > 8 && !muted) { String titles; if(playerRights == 0) { titles = "[Player]"; } else if(playerRights >= 1 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Freeze")) { titles = "[Game Staff]; } else if(donator == 1) { titles = "[V.I.P]"; } } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = " [Game Staff] "; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = " [Game Staff] "; } if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 2)) { yell(playerName+titles+": "+command.substring(8)); } else { sendMessage("You need 2 gold pieces to talk!"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Required talking
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("talking") && command.length() > 8 && !muted)	{
	String titles;
	if(playerRights == 0)	{
		titles = "[Player]";
	} else if(playerRights >= 1 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Freeze"))  {
		titles = "[Game Staff];
	} else if(donator == 1) {
		titles = "[V.I.P]";
	}
	if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 2))	{
		yell(playerName+titles+": "+command.substring(8));
	} else {
		sendMessage("You need 2 gold pieces to talk!");
	}
}

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @kelly15 kelly15
item.description:

if (command.startsWith(“talking”) && command.length() > 8 && muted == false) {
String titles = “”;

if (muted == true) {
        sM("You are Muted!");

}
else if (playerRights == 0) {
titles = " [Player]";
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = " [Game Staff] ";
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = " [Game Staff] ";
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = " [Game Staff] ";
}
if (donator == 1) {
titles = " [V.I.P] “;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Freeze”)) {
titles = " [Game Staff]”;
}
yell(playerName + “” + titles + ": "

  • command.substring(8));
    }
